attributes.action: be exiled from this britannic nation so that real men who have fought for our country can live in the country they love
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
deport Gordon brown get the gurkhas in, we all know who we like and trust more

yours sincerely a terribly unfashionable public schoolboy

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
